name: Re:Hazard
description:
In this game you are a virus infiltrating a computer, but the system will use copies of yourself against you. Destroy the core targets and eliminate your own shadows to get out of the loop.

Now, who's to blame. The program, or you?

This is our submission for the Extra Credits Cycles Jam!

We're a team of two Game Design students from Spain and all of the art, code and several sounds have been created for this jam by ourselves.

Controls: 

WASD to Move

Left-Click to Shoot

R for a faster restart after dying

Credits:

Adrián Núñez:  Coding

Alan Elwood: Art
